alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 10:54AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson Davis and southeastern Calcasieu Parishes through 1130 AM CDT... At 1054 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lebleu Settlement, or near Lake Charles, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Welsh, Iowa, Fenton, Moss Bluff, Buller, Lebleu Settlement and Lacassine. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 30 and 56. Interstate 210 between mile markers 8 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
